subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Brad Keselowski won the Nascar Nationwide Series race at Charlotte Motor Speedway in Concord, N.C., leading the final 67 laps.
snippet: Brad Keselowski won the Nascar Nationwide Series race at Charlotte Motor Speedway in Concord, N.C., leading the final 67 laps.
